name: Damn Those Birds!
description:
You just got a shiny brand-new racecar, and you DO NOT want to get it dirty.

 Damn those birds! Those poopin' birds are so annoying! You just got a shiny brand-new racecar, and you DO NOT want to get it dirty.

How to Play

Move the car using the left and right arrow keys. If you're on mobile, tap the left and right sides of the screen. Avoid getting hit by bird poop. Don't stop moving the car!
